description.value:
When you pull up the hood of this nondescript gray cloak (an Interact action), you become drab and uninteresting, gaining a +2 item bonus to Stealth checks and to Deception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Impersonate] a forgettable background character, such as a servant, but also taking a -1 item penalty to Diplomacy and Intimidation checks.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.Effect: Clandestine Cloak (Greater)]

Activate D envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You pull the cloak's hood up and gain the benefits of a 5th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Nondetection] for 8 hours or until you pull the hood back down, whichever comes first.
